columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the event data store.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the event data store.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of an event data store.

columns.name: created_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the event data store's creation.

columns.name: multi_region_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the event data store includes events from all regions, or only from the region in which it was created.

columns.name: organization_enabled
columns.description: Indicates that an event data store is collecting logged events for an organization.

columns.name: termination_protection_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the event data store is protected from termination.

columns.name: updated_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp showing when an event data store was updated, if applicable. UpdatedTimestamp is always either the same or newer than the time shown in CreatedTimestamp.

columns.name: advanced_event_selectors
columns.description: The advanced event selectors that were used to select events for the data store.
